span.p: Role: Operations Shared Services Analytics Leader
Location: Louisville, KY (In-Office), WAH out of state if able to travel 25%

p.style: FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0in 0.375in
FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0in 0.375in

span.p: OSS Analytics is an Enterprise Shared Services team focused on reporting and analytics supporting Humana’s Service Operations. The team is focused on converting data to actionable insights our business partners can utilize to reduce administrative cost and improve the customer’s experience.

p.style: FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0in 0.375in
FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0in 0.375in

span.p: This position will lead a group of business professionals within the OSS Analytics team. This team is focused on Service data infrastructure, Reporting and Data Visualization and Analytics. The ideal candidate will:

p.style: FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial; COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0in 0.375in

font.font: Knowledge of the healthcare insurance industry

div.span:
Humana Inc., headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky, is one of the nation's largest publicly traded health benefits companies. Humana offers a diversified portfolio of health insurance products and related services - through traditional and consumer-choice plans - to employer groups, government-sponsored plans, and individuals.
Today, Humana is a leader in consumer engagement. Throughout its diversified customer portfolio, the company provides guidance that can both help lower costs and lead to a better health plan experience.
